sentence.Network_en: The deal seems so attractive it would be ridiculous to say no.
sentence.Network_cn: 这笔交易看上去太诱人了，要是拒绝它简直是笑话。

sentence.Network_en: It was packaged in a fancy plastic case with attractive graphics.
sentence.Network_cn: 它装在一个别致的有漂亮图纹的塑料盒子里。

sentence.Network_en: They have to be thin, attractive and well-dressed to boot.
sentence.Network_cn: 她们必须得既苗条又迷人，而且一定要打扮漂亮。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (in the sense 'absorbent'): from French attractif, -ive, from late Latin attractivus, from the verb attrahere (see attract)

encyclopedia.content: 语法标注解释 attractive英音：[ə'træktiv]美音：[ə'træktɪv] 词典解释 形容词 a. 1.有吸引力的；引人注目的；妩媚动人的 The offer is very attractive to us. 这一出价对我们具有很大吸引力。 2.吸引的 attractive forces between molecules 分子间的引力 网络释义 attractive 1.有吸引人的，引起兴趣的 圈网| 中国英语口语俱乐部 - 话题 - ... attractive 有吸引人的，引起兴

entry.def: A person who is attractive is pleasant to look at.

example.tran: 她是个妩媚动人的女子。

example.ex: I thought he was very attractive and obviously very intelligent...
example.tran: 我觉得他魅力非凡，才智过人。

entry.def: Something that is attractive has a pleasant appearance or sound.

example.ex: The flat was small but attractive, if rather shabby...
example.tran: 虽然有些老旧，这仍不失为一个漂亮的小公寓。

example.ex: The creamy white flowers are attractive in the spring.
example.tran: 在春天，这种乳白色的花朵分外迷人。

entry.tran: 吸引人的;值得拥有（或做）的
entry.def: You can describe something as attractive when it seems worth having or doing.

example.ex: Co-operation was more than just an attractive option, it was an obligation...
example.tran: 合作不仅仅是诱人的选择，它也是一种责任。

example.ex: Smoking is still attractive to many young people who see it as glamorous.
example.tran: 吸烟对很多年轻人还是很有诱惑力，他们觉得这让自己显得魅力十足。

means.word_mean: 1. pleasing to the eye or mind especially through beauty or charm;

sentences.sentence: "the job is attractive because of the pay"

means.word_mean: 3. having the properties of a magnet; the ability to draw or pull;

sentences.sentence: "the knife hung on a magnetic board"

abs离开+tract拉→被拉开→心不在焉

stems_affixes.value_cn: 吸引人的,引人注意的;漂亮的,迷人的
stems_affixes.word_buile: attract[v.吸引]+ive……的→adj.吸引人的,引人注意的;漂亮的,迷人的
tract拉,拖,抽+or物器→拉的东西→拖拉机
attract[v.吸引]+ion表名词→n.吸引;吸引力;引力
con共同+tract拉,拖,抽→把二者[或以上]拉到一起,形成制约→[订]合同/契约,使缩小
at加强动作+tract拉→拉过来→吸引
con共同+tract拉,拖,抽→把二者[或以上]拉到一起,形成制约→[订]合同/契约,使缩小

Sentence.sentence: However,if your bond does not have features hat make it attractive to other investors, you may be forced to sell your bond at a discount i.
The curtains were never drawn, even at night, so guests got a view of the lake and fountains outside which were lit up at night – a very attractive sight.
Convenient academic schedules with more-focused, less-expensive degrees will be more attractive to bright, motivated students.

means.word_mean: 性感的；妩媚的；英俊的；诱人的

sentences.cn: 她是个妩媚动人的女孩。

sentences.en: Bright colours are attractive to children.
sentences.cn: 鲜艳的颜色对儿童有吸引力。

jushi.english: Your friend has a very attractive personality.
jushi.chinese: 你朋友的个性很有魅力。
他们的孩子非常讨人喜欢。
她是个妩媚动人的女孩。
